snippet: A Thai military court sentenced 10 people for distributing online content that it said insulted the monarchy.
abstract: Thai military court hands down sentences to 10 people for distributing online content that it said to have insulted the monarchy; police say network was headed by Hassadin Uraipraiwan, more widely known as DJ Banpodj.
lead_paragraph: A Thai military court sentenced 10 people for distributing online content that it said insulted the monarchy.

headline.print_headline: Asia; Thailand: 10 Jailed in Lèse-Majesté Case
